Room.Name: Mordith's Silver Apple Tree
Room.ShortDescription: You are under Mordith's silver apple tree, just outside her hut.
Room.LongDescription: Mordith, the middle daughter of Mehetable, intends to give the silver apples to whomever she marries. Many have been the suitors, but her mother has rejected all of them, waiting for the sons of Trantori to return from the mountains to the east where they have sought adventure.
